description: With all the crazy shit that's happened recently to Gunner, all he's looking for is a nice, new place to call home and maybe a romantic reset. When the leasing agent shows him a fully furnished apartment in his budget, Gunner realizes that Shawn Reeves can help him the first, but when Shawn and Gunner's immediate chemistry sets off sparks, he realizes there may be more to this package deal. Shawn makes his move and they kiss. He takes the opportunity and pounces, quickly working Gunner out of his pants and kneeling down to suck him off. As he does, Gunner forgets all about his crazy exes, and realizes he's been missing out with guys his whole life. He indulges as Shawn spreads his legs for him, and Gunner slaps his hole before plunging his raw cock deep into Shawn. Shawn moans as he feels every inch of Gunner's throbbing cock, and as Gunner fucks him completely and thoroughly all over the fully furnished room, Shawn realizes he's gonna be around a lot more often than his job requires. Gunner sure hopes so! Enjoy!
title: Fully Furnished
